to.sven.androidrccar.client.service.contract

Interface IClientConfigurationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientConfigurationService

    public interface IClientConfigurationService
    Provides access to the configuration of the Client application.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBatteryPowerMessageInterval()
      Gets the interval, how often the host should send BatteryPowerMessages in milliseconds.
      boolean getCameraEnabled()
      Defines, if showing the camera stream is enabled on the Client.
      ConnectionParameter getConnectionParameter()
      Creates connection parameter from settings.
      java.lang.String getLastHostAdress()
      Gets the IP/Hostname that was used for the last connection.
      int getLastPort()
      Gets the port that was used for the last connection.
      int getLocationMessageInterval()
      Gets the interval, how often the host should send LocationMessages in milliseconds.
      java.lang.String getSavedPassword()
      Gets the password, if saved, else null.
      void reset()
      Resets to the default configuration.
      void resetSavedConnectionParameter()
      Reset the connection parameter values to default (nothing).
      void saveConnectionParameter(ConnectionParameter connectionParameter)
      Save the connection parameters in the settings.

    • Method Detail

      • getBatteryPowerMessageInterval

        int getBatteryPowerMessageInterval()
        Gets the interval, how often the host should send BatteryPowerMessages in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Interval in milliseconds

      • getLocationMessageInterval

        int getLocationMessageInterval()
        Gets the interval, how often the host should send LocationMessages in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Interval in milliseconds

      • getCameraEnabled

        boolean getCameraEnabled()
        Defines, if showing the camera stream is enabled on the Client.
        Returns:
        true, if enabled.

      • getLastHostAdress

        java.lang.String getLastHostAdress()
        Gets the IP/Hostname that was used for the last connection. If there is no, a empty string.
        Returns:
        IP/Hostname

      • getLastPort

        int getLastPort()
        Gets the port that was used for the last connection. If there is no, the default port.
        Returns:
        Port

      • getSavedPassword

        java.lang.String getSavedPassword()
        Gets the password, if saved, else null.
        Returns:
        password Password String or null

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets to the default configuration.

      • getConnectionParameter

        ConnectionParameter getConnectionParameter()
        Creates connection parameter from settings.
        Returns:
        Created ConnectionParameter

      • resetSavedConnectionParameter

        void resetSavedConnectionParameter()
        Reset the connection parameter values to default (nothing).

      • saveConnectionParameter

        void saveConnectionParameter(ConnectionParameter connectionParameter)
        Save the connection parameters in the settings.
        Parameters:
        connectionParameter - connection parameters to save
